messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Units in the area of Newburgh and 264.
I'm getting out on Newburgh.
Still in our police car, on town.
Razor case subject has stolen a marked police car. He's westbound on Waterson from Newburgh.
Channel.
Be advised in reference to the hold-up alarm at Wendy's.
We're 1050 and in the ditch.
Razor K, advising 1050 at Preston in the ditch.
Continuing on. He might be trying to make his way back down.
One person highway north-south, equipment 5621 northbound.
Correction on the address, 1624.
Equipment number on the police car, 5621.
The 4th Division unit, starting for Preston.
411 Adam, on Preston.
Vehicle pursuit passing Audubon Parkway, speed about 105 miles an hour.
Northbound on Preston, passing Eastern.
Subject is in a marked police car.
Equipment number 3621. Make sure all cars know he’s in a marked car.
The shotgun is locked in the rack.
Northbound on Bradley, west on Brandeis.
Lost visual at first and Oak.
Northbound on 2nd coming up on Broadway.
14 Baker, gray or white car?
White car, lights on, northbound on 2nd.
I no longer have visual.
Last known location was northbound.
Circling back onto 65, northbound.
Getting off Jackson Charles.
Eastbound on 10th Street, passing Wall.
Jacksonville takeover.
South down on Pratt from 10th Street.
Westbound on South Alley, back up to 10th Street.
Westbound on 10th back towards 65.
Southbound on 65.
Shutting down at the bridge.
Officers to set up on the Kentucky side of 65.
Taking Second Street bridge.
Off at Main from Second Street.
South down towards the river.
Eastbound on Market.
Westbound near Rocky's.
Subject in the river with a squad car.
Subject in the river on the Indiana side.
134 Adam, do you have a visual?
Got him, gunpoint.
134 Adam, shots fired!
Suspect down in the water.
No officers injured, suspect down in the river.
